name: Ben
description: Ben (thats me!) created the cat sitter search app after being inspired by his cat Poppy to find a more convenient way to find trustworthy cat sitters.

name: Lisa
description: Lisa (Ben's partner in crime) provides moral support to the team and keeps everyone motivated to provide the best user experience possible.

name: Poppy
description: Poppy inspired the creation of the cat sitter search app by being absolutely adorable.
